settings.title: Commission a Custom Piece
settings.text:
I love creating custom pieces that reflect your personal style and needs. Whether you're looking for a special gift, a set of dinnerware, or a unique vase, I can work with you to bring your vision to life.

Each custom order is carefully planned and crafted with the same attention to detail as my regular collection. Lead times vary depending on complexity and my current kiln schedule.

settings.title: Process
settings.text:
1. Initial consultation to discuss your vision
2. Design sketch and materials selection
3. Deposit required to begin work
4. Hand-crafting and glazing
5. Firing and finishing
6. Final delivery or pickup

settings.title: Timeline
settings.text:
Custom orders typically take 4-6 weeks from design approval to completion. This includes drying time, glazing, and firing cycles.

Rush orders may be available for an additional fee, depending on current workload.

settings.title: Pricing
settings.text:
Custom work is priced based on size, complexity, and materials used. Most custom pieces range from $50-$300.

A 50% deposit is required to begin work, with the balance due upon completion.

settings.title: Start Your Custom Order
settings.text: Ready to commission a custom piece? Use the form below to tell me about your project. Include details about size, style, colors, and intended use.
